metadata.title: KOMFOTT Futon Sofa Bed, Linen Fabric Memory Foam Convertible Futon Couch with Adjustable Backrest & Armrests, Metal Legs, Modern Loveseat Sleeper Bed Split-Back Sofa for Small Apartment & Office
features: One Sofa in 5 Forms: The backrest features 3-level adjustment angle (105°, 145°, 180°) and the armrests can be lifted or lowered to 4 positions, which makes it easy to transform the sofa into a lounge couch, split-back sofa, bed and lazy floor couch. Meanwhile, the armrests can serve as pillows to support your neck when sleeping.

Stay in Coziness: Covered by premium soft linen-like polyester fabric, the futon couch is super skin-friendly and breathable. The upholstered backrest and seat are filled with 2.5” thick memory foam with CertiPUR-US certification, which ensure exceptional comfort and great safety. Luxury enjoyment awaits you, right here!

Applicable to Various Occasions: It’s a perfect companion for your cozy relaxing time. If you want to leave your friends overnight, just turn the loveseat sleeper flat. With compact size and multi-purpose design, this futon sofa bed will be a worthwhile and space-saving addition to living room, study, office, apartment, etc.

Ultra-Stable Construction: The convertible sofa bed is equipped with 6 heavy-duty metal legs that bring strong weight capacity up to 600 lbs, so you can sit, lean, lie on the futon with great confidence. Besides, protective covers underneath legs avoid undesired sliding and protect your floor from unwanted scratches.

Worry About Assembly? Never Mind!: The futon sofa bed doesn’t require expert assembly and can be set up in just 3 steps: unfold the cushions, find all accessories in the bottom zippered pocket and then fix sofa legs. If necessary, you can wipe the dust away and keep it clean with a soft cloth.
description: Need a sofa bed for your small living space? Our futon sofa bed is your best choice!It will give you great satisfaction from comfortable sitting experience to practical design. The adjustable backrest and armrests enable you to use the futon sofa as a lounge couch, split-back sofa, bed and lazy floor couch, which meets your different needs, such as watching TV, relaxing, taking a nap and even leaving your friends at home to spend a pleasant night. What’s more, 6 sturdy metal legs create an ultra-stable construction and offer 600 lbs high bearing capacity. Sink into the 2.5” memory foam padding with supportive serpentine springs underneath, and enjoy cozy time with your family and friends.

Serve as a futon sofa, lounge couch, split-back sofa, bed and lazy floor couchDesigned with 3-level adjustable backrest and 4-level convertible armrests2.5” thick memory foam padding for comfortable sitting experienceCertiPUR-US certification ensures that our memory foam is high-qualityBreathable and skin-friendly linen-like polyester fabric improves comfortHigh-tenacity serpentine spring avoids sagging6 sturdy metal legs offer reliable stability and weight capacity to 600 lbsComes with protective foot pads for extra stabilitySuitable for living room, study, office and any small spaceSimple assembly steps and complete accessories save you time and effortThe sofa legs, screws and tool are stored in the bottom zippered pocket

Color: Brown/ Black/ GrayMaterial: Linen-like Polyester Fabric , Memory Foam, Wood, MetalDimension of Sofa: 72” x 34.5 x 32.5”(L x W x H)Dimension of Bed: 72” x 42” x 17” (L x W x H)Dimension of Each Lazy Couch: 36” x 34.5” x 20” (L x W x H)Net Weight: 73 lbsWeight Capacity: 600 lbsPackage Includes:1 x Futon Sofa Bed1 x InstructionWhy You Choose Our Futon Sofa Bed?Can be used as a bed to entertain guestsThe soft memory foam provides optimal comfort
